name: Beautiful Romantic Poop Painting_Mono_#000
description: In dialogue with the idea of Modern abstraction in painting, I aim to transform an a priori abstract sign -emoji- to another form of visual expression in a limited time with a limited set of continuous gestures end up with a full smear. The short clips (~40 sec.) show the entire process and content i.e. the source, human gestural intervention and result. The unrepeatable outcome forms a double image at the end, thus forcing a sense of intentionality contrasting with the spontaneity of the genre.
